Description: The following statement contains a magic number: _employees = Enumerable.Range(1' 5).Select(i =>                          new Employee                          {                              ID = i'                              FullName = "Name" + i'                              Sex = Gender.Female'                              Address = new Address()                              {                                  Street = "Street" + i'                                  City = "City" + i'                              }'                          }).ToList();
